CustomField.description: Individual value of Billings and Pass-Through Billings minus Total Costs. Derived from this project alone, separate from child project roll ups.
CustomField.formula: pse__NRV_Billings__c + pse__NRV_Pass_Through_Billings__c - pse__NRV_Internal_Costs__c - pse__NRV_External_Costs__c - pse__NRV_Expense_Costs__c - pse__NRV_Other_Costs__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Individual value of Billings and Pass-Through Billings minus Total Costs. Derived from this project alone, separate from child project roll ups.
CustomField.label: Individual Margin
